attributes.action: Visitors to the UK to have medical insurance cover.
attributes.additional_details: Source of costs to NHS Imperial College Trust which includes St Mary's obtained from the BBC News Website.
attributes.background: The only option available to help the NHS would be to ensure that all foreign visitors to this country have full medical insurance cover.

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/182047
